com.hybris.services.entitlements.condition.metered

Class MeteredConditionStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hybris.services.entitlements.condition.AbstractConditionStrategy
      • com.hybris.services.entitlements.condition.metered.MeteredConditionStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionHandlerFactory, GrantValidator

    public class MeteredConditionStrategy
extends AbstractConditionStrategy
implements ActionHandlerFactory
    Implementation of metered condition strategy, which requires a quantity parameter for both granting and checking an entitlement.
